titles.title: Congratulating the Syracuse University men's lacrosse team on winning the NCAA Division I National Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 6/9/2004--Introduced. Congratulates the Syracuse University men's lacrosse team for winning the 2004 NCAA Division I National Championship. Recognizes the achievements of all the team's players, coaches, and support staff and invites them to the U.S. Capitol to be honored. Requests that the President recognize the team's achievements and invite them to the White House for an appropriate ceremony.
